alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 2:08AM CDT until June 18 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ottawa County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 208 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Chetopa to 4 miles south of Seneca, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Commerce... Quapaw... Picher... Ottawa... Peoria... Cardin... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 310 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
